content.rendered:
Intervention means

Wherever needed

In Europe, in Africa, in the Middle East, online: Bioforce is available and accessible to anyone, anywhere.

Regional training centres in Europe and in Africa

With premises suited to theoretical and practical learning, equipped to provide life-size simulations, these locally-based centres offer individuals and organisations continual access to high-quality learning.

Our centres

A tailor-made platform for distance learning programmes

Distance training based on a large variety of activities: animated self learning activities, group work, tutor support and feedback, learning progression tests. All of Bioforce’s learning expertise accessible through our Moodle platform.

Find out more

Field missions

In West and Central Africa (CAR), and in the Middle East (Lebanon and Jordan), Bioforce’s permanent missions conduct our capacity building programmes in the field.

Our missions

Deployment in the field

Bioforce is able to deploy training courses in any geographical area, including in emergency contexts: Bangui, Nigeria, Haiti, Iraq…

Find out more
